main.description: Create or toggle a vote on a post or comment. If a vote in the same direction exists, it will be removed (toggled off). If a vote in the opposite direction exists, it will be replaced.

subject.description: Strong reference to the post or comment being voted on

direction.description: Vote direction: up for upvote, down for downvote

uri.description: AT-URI of the created vote (empty string if vote was toggled off)

cid.description: CID of the created vote (empty string if vote was toggled off)

errors.name: SubjectNotFound
errors.description: The subject post or comment was not found

errors.name: NotAuthorized
errors.description: User is not authorized to vote on this content

errors.name: InvalidSubject
errors.description: The subject reference is invalid or malformed
